title: Life Inside
description: Lester Holt spends two nights embedded inside the largest maximum security prison in America, the notorious Louisiana State Penitentiary, also known as Angola. Originally aired on NBC on September 6, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
